name: Construct
description:
Choose to pay the associated cost to create one of the following tiles in target space following the restrictions in parentheses:
 • @{tile::Explosive} (empty space, 30 EP)
 • @{tile::Barricade} (empty space, 6 EP)
• @{tile::Turret} (empty space, 6 EP)
 • @{tile::Smoke Screen} (4 EP)
 • @{tile::Fire Patch} (2 EP)
comment: Items in modifers can either be integers or string expressions
